targets.rawSql: select count(*) as "Service count" from service;

select service.name, count(permission.policy_id) as "Policies in Services" from service inner join permission on permission.service_id=service.id inner join policy on policy.id=permission.policy_id where policy.account_id="$acc" group by service.name order by count(permission.policy_id) desc;

panels.title: Top Services with more policies in $acc

targets.rawSql: select count(*) as "Policy count" from policy where policy.account_id="$acc";

select po.name as policy, count(distinct pe.service_id) as service_cant from permission as pe inner join policy as po on pe.policy_id=po.id where po.account_id="$acc" and po.scope != "AWS" group by po.arn order by count(pe.service_id) desc limit 20;

panels.title: TOP 10 Policies with access to services  ($acc)

targets.rawSql: select name, attachment_count from policy where account_id="$acc" order by attachment_count desc limit 20;
select now() as time , scope, count(id) from policy where account_id="$acc" group by scope;
select count(*) as "Customer Managed" from policy where policy.scope = 'Local' and policy.account_id="$acc";
select count(*) as 'AWS Managed' from policy where policy.scope = 'AWS' and policy.account_id="$acc";

panels.description: This metrics displays actions occurrences in services .

targets.rawSql: select now() as time , name, sum(tagging) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id where service.name in ("ec2","s3","cloudwatch","iam","rds","dynamodb")  group by service.name order by sum(tagging);

select now() as time , name, sum(managing) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id where service.name in ("ec2","s3","cloudwatch","iam","rds","dynamodb")  group by service.name order by sum(managing);

select now() as time , name, sum(writing) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id where service.name in ("ec2","s3","cloudwatch","iam","rds", "dynamodb")  group by service.name order by sum(writing);

select now() as time , name, sum(listing) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id where service.name in ("ec2","s3","cloudwatch","iam","rds","dynamodb")  group by service.name order by sum(listing);

select now() as time , name, sum(reading) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id where service.name in ("ec2","s3","cloudwatch","iam","rds","dynamodb")  group by service.name order by sum(reading);

panels.title: Actions

targets.rawSql: select service.name, sum(reading) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id inner join policy on permission.policy_id=policy.id where policy.account_id="$acc" group by service.name order by sum(reading) desc limit 10;

select service.name, sum(writing) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id inner join policy on permission.policy_id=policy.id where policy.account_id="$acc" group by service.name order by sum(writing) desc limit 10;

select service.name, sum(tagging) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id inner join policy on permission.policy_id=policy.id where policy.account_id="$acc" group by service.name order by sum(tagging) desc limit 10;

select service.name, sum(listing) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id inner join policy on permission.policy_id=policy.id where policy.account_id="$acc" group by service.name order by sum(listing) desc limit 10;

select service.name, sum(managing) from permission inner join service on service.id=permission.service_id inner join policy on permission.policy_id=policy.id where policy.account_id="$acc" group by service.name order by sum(managing) desc limit 10;
select count(*) from role where account_id="$acc";

select r.name as role_name, count(p.name) as policy_cant from role as r inner join role_policy as rp on r.id = rp.role_id inner join policy as p on rp.policy_id = p.id where r.account_id="$acc" group by role_name order by policy_cant desc limit 15;

select ro.name,
       count(distinct ta.account_id) + count( distinct tu.user_id) + count(distinct ts.service_id) + count(distinct tr.assuming_role_id) as "Total"
from role as ro
         left join trusted_role_account as ta on ta.role_id = ro.id
         left join trusted_role_user as tu on tu.role_id = ro.id
         left join trusted_role_service as ts on ts.role_id = ro.id
         left join trusted_role_role as tr on tr.role_id = ro.id
where ro.foreign=0 and ro.account_id="$acc"
group by ro.name
order by Total desc limit 15

panels.title: Top Roles with more Trusted Entities  ($acc)

targets.rawSql:
select service.name as "Service", count(distinct role.arn)
from service
         inner join permission on permission.service_id = service.id
         inner join policy on policy.id = permission.policy_id
         inner join role_policy on policy.id = role_policy.policy_id
        inner join role on role.id = role_policy.role_id
where role.account_id="$acc"
group by service.name
order by count(distinct role.arn) desc
select count(*) as "User count" from user where account_id="$acc"

select count(distinct(policy.id)) as "Policies in Users" from policy inner join user inner join user_policy on user.id=user_policy.user_id and policy.id=user_policy.policy_id where user.account_id="$acc";

select user.name, count(policy.name) as "Policy in Users" from user inner join policy inner join user_policy on user.id=user_policy.user_id and policy.id=user_policy.policy_id where user.account_id="$acc" group by user.name order by count(policy.name) desc limit 15;

select policy.name, count(user.name) as "Users in Policy" from policy inner join user inner join user_policy on user.id=user_policy.user_id and policy.id=user_policy.policy_id where user.account_id="$acc" group by policy.name order by count(user.name) desc limit 10;

list.definition: select id as __value , name as __text from account where `foreign`!=1;
list.label: Account:
list.name: acc
list.query: select id as __value , name as __text from account where `foreign`!=1;
list.tagValuesQuery: select id, name from account where `foreign`!=1;
